name: v1_planets
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool planets_by_api_ninjas.
Tool description: Get statistics on thousands of planets in the known universe. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/planets.
API description: Get a list of planets matching specified parameters. Returns at most 30 results. To access more than 30 results, use the offset parameter to offset results in multiple API calls.

max_period.description: Maximum orbital period of the planet in Earth days.

max_temperature.description: Maximum average surface temperature of the planet in Kelvin.

offset.description: Number of results to offset for pagination.

max_distance_light_year.description: Maximum distance the planet is from Earth in light years.

min_distance_light_year.description: Minimum distance the planet is from Earth in light years.

max_mass.description: Maximum mass of the planet in Jupiters (1 Jupiter = 1.898 × 10^27 kg).

max_semi_major_axis.description: Maximum semi-major axis of the planet in astronomical units (AU).

min_mass.description: Minimum mass of the planet in Jupiters (1 Jupiter = 1.898 × 10^27 kg).

min_semi_major_axis.description: Minimum semi-major axis of the planet in astronomical units (AU).

name.description: Name of the planet. Defaults to 'Mars'.

min_temperature.description: Minimum average surface temperature of the planet in Kelvin.

max_radius.description: Maximum average radius of the planet in Jupiters (1 Jupiter = 69911 km).

min_radius.description: Minimum average radius of the planet in Jupiters (1 Jupiter = 69911 km).

min_period.description: Minimum orbital period of the planet in Earth days.
